name: Eye Lasers
description:
Eye Lasers was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 as a first person shooter without shooting. Take away guns, and you get a bunch of people trying to hide behind cover to avoid sight lines.

Created in Unity by Nicholas Robbins and Matthew Roy

Music:
Club Seamus Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Game requires two controllers
LEFT STICK to move
RIGHT STICK to look around
RIGHT BUMPER to slide
LEFT BUMPER to use grenades
ESCAPE to quit
